name: Trick or treat
status: When caster uses skills (not auto attack), there is a 50% chance to increase M.Atk by 20 points; the effect lasts 15 seconds, and can stack up 5 times.

name: Tyrfing
status: Str ＋10, Agi ＋10, Dex ＋10, All Attributes ＋8, Hit ＋50, Atk ＋16%, Dmg ＋12%, Demi-Human Race Damage ＋30%, Max HP ＋17000

name: Tyrfing Reforged
status: Str ＋10, Agi ＋10, Dex ＋10, All Attributes ＋14, Hit ＋50, Atk ＋20%, Dmg ＋15%, Demi-Human Race Damage ＋40%, Max HP ＋26000, Dmg Reduc. ＋5%, Magic Reduc. ＋5%, Tyr's power will cure all diseases in the area. All allies within a 8-meter radius will gain [Tyre's Blessing]. [Tyre's Blessing]: immediately restores 25% of Max HP, removes all crowd control effects ( states incurable by Panacea included), and immunize crowd control effects; this effect lasts 5 seconds; CD: 180 seconds.

name: Tyrfing Sky Forged
status: Str ＋10, Agi ＋10, Dex ＋10, All Attributes ＋20, Hit ＋50, Atk ＋24%, Dmg ＋18%, Demi-Human Race Damage ＋50%, Max HP ＋35000, Dmg Reduc. ＋10%, Magic Reduc. ＋10%, Tyr's power will cure all diseases and crowd control effects in the effecting area. All allies within a 8-meter radius will gain [Tyre's Blessing]. [Tyre's Blessing]: immediately restores 45% of Max HP, removes all crowd control effects ( states uncurable by Panacea included), and immunize crowd control effects; this effect lasts 5 seconds; CD: 120 seconds.
